about.title: About me
about.abstract: <italic>Computer Engineer</italic>. A lifelong enthusiast of technology, computing, and video games.<break/> I've been working as an indie <italic>game developer</italic> since 2019.

master.title: Master in Computer Engineering
master.abstract: Professional Master's Degree in Computer Engineering, in which students acquire knowledge of different branches of computer science (UI/UX, web/mobile programming, data analysis, big data, network systems, service creation and provisioning, etc.) as well as software design and working methodologies.

degree.title: Degree in Computer Engineering
degree.abstract: Education in the design, development, implementation, and maintenance of computer systems and applications, applying knowledge of mathematics, computer science, and electronics.<break/>During my degree studies, I decided to focus on graphic and video game development, teaching myself Unity 3D.
